SEARCH
Package src

Class LevelProgress

java.lang.Object
src.LevelProgress
public class LevelProgress extends Object
Class tracks level progress and implements methods to modify and obtain level information.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Ho Lun (Geoffrey) Kong

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LevelProgress()
    Constructor builds the default progress for a new account (all levels locked, except the Sun, which is set to the current level, and all scores set to zero).
    LevelProgress(org.json.simple.JSONArray progress)
    Constructor takes in progress as input so that the getter and setter methods in this class can be applied to it.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelProgress

      public LevelProgress()
      Constructor builds the default progress for a new account (all levels locked, except the Sun, which is set to the current level, and all scores set to zero).

    • LevelProgress

      public LevelProgress(org.json.simple.JSONArray progress)
      Constructor takes in progress as input so that the getter and setter methods in this class can be applied to it.
      Parameters:
      progress - a JSONArray that stores a user's progress.

  • Method Details

    • getProgress

      public org.json.simple.JSONArray getProgress()
      Method returns the progress instance variable.
      Returns:
      a JSONArray storing the progress in the instance variable.

    • getCurrentLevel

      public int getCurrentLevel()
      Method returns the level number of the user's current level.
      Returns:
      the number of the current level the user is on

    • setLevelScore

      public void setLevelScore(int levelNumber, int score)
      Method sets the score for a specified level.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - the number of the level to change the score for
      score - the new score to assign to the level

    • getLevelScore

      public int getLevelScore(int levelNumber)
      Method gets the score for a specified level.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - the number of the level to get the score for
      Returns:
      the highscore of the specified level

    • setUnlockedStatus

      public void setUnlockedStatus(int levelNumber, boolean unlockStatus)
      Method sets the unlocked status for a specified level.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - the number of the level to get the unlocked status for
      unlockStatus - the unlocked status to set the level to
